main.name: Ryan Brown
main.occupation: Full Stack Developer + Machine Learning Researcher
main.bio: Mixed reality and machine learning researcher, currently 3D scanning specialist focused on digital reconstruction, projection mapping and augmented reality interfacing.

education.degree: Machine Learning + Server Side Development - Product Managment
education.description: Focusing on a machine learning model to target block group level trends for risk indicators and necessary tenants for public health. Wrote and submitted proposal to speak at O'reilly's OSCON  with the founder of Hack Oregon, Cat Nikolovski. With a f ocus on scaling collaborative work spaces engaging with civic data. Working on system architecture for OSCON talk, also primary api developer on this years neighborhood development team.

work.title: 3D Technician + Fullstack Development
work.description: Primarily conducting Machine Learning research and iteration on model development for computer vision and nlp tasks.

work.title: Cofounder + Fullstack Development
work.description: Full stack development for 3d BIM and Mixed reality portal. The Backend api is interacting with autodesk forge’s api for data management, asset storage, format conversion methods, and primarily a 3d viewport for all your BIM projects. I have developed a Django DRF  backend that allocates management capabilities of all your 3d projects, aprx 60 file formats can be handled for a variety of 3d file types  for upload , base64 encoding, and delivery to a react frontend.

work.title: 3D Scanning Technician and RnD specialist.
work.description: 3D Scanning Specialist focused on using a variety of 3d scanners and types of data acquisition software. Primary focus on Artec Handheld scanners, and solutionX for scanning services oriented in design, manufacturing and prototyping. Point cloud processing included, cleaning, mesh creation, and texture mapping.  I am proficient in countless 3d softwares for Reverse engineering, QC/QA, lighting, rigging, and texturing.

projects.title: Civic Platform
projects.description: We’re reimagining how to make information actionable through visual models, open standards, and creative frameworks that harness human collaboration at scale.

projects.title: Digital Scan 3D
projects.tags: Autodesk API's, 3D Software Including Artec, Unity, Rhino, and Geomagic solutions.

projects.title: Zonerise
projects.category: Django + React Development and 3D asset managment with autodesk forge api's.
projects.tags: Django API Development, React UI/UX, Forge Autodesk

testimonials.text: Ryan is brilliant, visionary, and fired up to change the world. Get ready!
